mapper.select: select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.post_content as post_content, post.create_time as create_time, post.area_id as area_id, post.board_id as board_id, post.participants as participants, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comments, post.ban_comment, post.up, post.secret, post.first_image, type.name as post_type, u.nick_name as nick_name, u.head_image as head_image from test_bbs.t_post post left outer join test_bbs.post_type type on post.post_type=type.id left outer join test_bbs.t_user u on u.id=post.user_id where post.id=#{id};

select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.post_content as post_content, post.create_time as create_time, post.area_id as area_id, post.board_id as board_id, post.participants as participants, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comments, post.ban_comment as ban_comment, post.up as up, post.secret as secret, post.first_image as first_image, type.name as post_type from test_bbs.t_post post ,test_bbs.post_type type where post.user_id=#{id} and post.post_type =type.id ;

select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.create_time as create_time, post.area_id as area_id, post.board_id as board_id, post.participants as participants, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comments, post.ban_comment as ban_comment, post.up as up, post.secret as secret, post.first_image as first_image, type.name as post_type, user.nick_name as nick_name, user.head_image as head_image from test_bbs.t_post post ,test_bbs.post_type type,test_bbs.t_user user where /*DATEDIFF(post.create_time,NOW())<1 AND DATEDIFF(post.create_time,NOW())>-3 AND*/ post.user_id=user.id AND post.post_type =type.id AND post.first_image is not null order by RAND() limit 4;

select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.participants as participants, post.create_time as create_time, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comm, post.first_image as first_image, post.up as up from test_bbs.t_post post where post.board_id=#{boardId} /*and DATEDIFF(post.create_time,NOW())<1 and DATEDIFF(post.create_time,NOW())>-5*/ order by post.participants desc limit 5;

select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.participants as participants, post.create_time as create_time, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comm, post.first_image as first_image, post.up as up, b1.board_title as board_title from test_bbs.t_post post,test_bbs.t_board b1 where post.board_id in ( select id from test_bbs.t_board board where board.panel_id =#{panelId}) /* and DATEDIFF(post.create_time, NOW())<1 and DATEDIFF(post.create_time, NOW())> -5*/ and post.board_id=b1.id order by post.participants desc limit 5

select post.id, post.post_title, post.user_id, user.nick_name, post.create_time, board.board_title, board.user_id as board_manager_id, post.up, post.ban_comment, post.secret from test_bbs.t_post post, t_board board, t_user user where board.id = post.board_id and user.id = board.user_id;

select post.id, post.post_title, post.user_id, u.nick_name, post.create_time, b1.board_title, post.up, post.ban_comment, post.secret from test_bbs.t_post post, test_bbs.t_board b1, test_bbs.t_user u where post.board_id in ( select id from test_bbs.t_board board where board.panel_id in ( select id from test_bbs.t_panel panel where panel.user_manager_id = #{id} )) and post.board_id = b1.id and u.id=post.user_id order by post.create_time desc;

select post.id, post.post_title, post.user_id, user.nick_name, post.create_time, board.board_title, post.up, post.ban_comment, post.secret, board.board_title as board_title from test_bbs.t_post post, test_bbs.t_board board, test_bbs.t_user user where post.board_id = board.id and board.id in ( select id from test_bbs.t_board b where b.user_id = #{id} ) and user.id = post.user_id;

select post.id, post.post_title, post.user_id, user.nick_name, post.create_time, board.board_title, board.user_id as board_manager_id, post.up, post.ban_comment, post.secret from test_bbs.t_post post, t_board board, t_user user where board.id = post.board_id and user.id = board.user_id limit #{currentPage} ,#{pageSize};
select count(id) from test_bbs.t_post p where p.user_id=#{id}
select post.id ,post.post_title ,post.comments from t_post post where post.area_id =#{areaId} order by post.praises limit 5

select post.id, post.post_title, type.name as post_type, post.comments, post.create_time, post.user_id, user.nick_name, user.head_image from t_post post, t_user user, post_type type where post.user_id in (select user_id from t_collections where current_user_id =#{id} ) AND user.id = post.user_id and type.id = post.post_type order by post.create_time desc

select post.id, post.post_title, post.user_id, user.nick_name, post.create_time, board.board_title, board.user_id as board_manager_id, post.up, post.ban_comment, post.secret from test_bbs.t_post post, t_board board, t_user user where board.id = post.board_id and user.id = board.user_id and post.post_title like "%"#{postTitle}"%";

select post.id as id , post.user_id as user_id, post.post_title as post_title, post.post_content as post_content, post.create_time as create_time, post.area_id as area_id, post.board_id as board_id, post.participants as participants, post.praises as praises, post.comments as comments, post.ban_comment as ban_comment, post.up as up, post.secret as secret, post.first_image as first_image, type.name as post_type from test_bbs.t_post post ,test_bbs.post_type type where post.user_id=#{id} and post.post_type =type.id and post.post_title like "%"#{myPostTitle}"%" ;
